web package¶

Submodules¶

web.connection module¶

Manage network connection via url

class web.connection.Connection¶

Base class to make connection request to url

This class take the responsibility to manage connection request, getting URL and Json responses

classmethod get_unicode_json_response(url, username=None, password=None)¶

Get the Json response from url

Parameters:
  • url (str) – the url to get response from
  • username (str) – optional user name for authentication if required
  • password (str) – optional password for authentication if required
Returns:

response_api.text
Return type:

unicode
classmethod get_url_response(url, username=None, password=None, headers=None, timeout=None)¶

Get Response from url

Parameters:
  • url (str) – the url to get response from
  • username (str) – optional user name for authentication if required
  • password (str) – optional password for authentication if required
  • headers (dict) – lines sent by the client in a HTTP protocol transaction
  • timeout (float) – Requests to stop waiting for a response after a given number of seconds
Returns:

response
Return type:

requests.Response
classmethod join_url(*args)¶

Pythonic way to make urls WARNING Don’t send any argument starting with /

Parameters:args – all arguments to be joined
Returns:final url
